item.title: Status Update – January 1, 2020
item.description: Kids woke us up, I sent them to their rooms and told them to be quiet. Went back to bed and to sleep. Lesa got up and kept things quiet. I slept until 10am! Longest in almost 6 years unless sick. It was awesome. Lesa made me coffee which was nice. I played Battleship with Ashley, then Dwyane. Took Dwyane to Mrs Dillman’s house, her grandson Jay invited Dwyane to spend the night and go to Urban Air with them, it’s his first sleepover, I think he’s ready and will be okay.
